channel.title: Refreshing public shared dashboards
channel.description: Hi, We created a few dashboards with static and dashboard parameters and shared the public link with our customers. we want the public dashboard to refresh every 12 hours (or alternatively refresh when it's opened) We tried adding &refresh=1 to the public url, it refreshes the dashboard only after a while.
